title: Gossamyr
description: But this is Gossamyr's first trip to the war-ravaged mortal realm, and it seduces with its own enchantments. With her new traveling companion, Gossamyr takes the first steps to save her people.- Michele Hauf is the author of over eight romance novels. Gossamyr is her second fantasy novel.- Gossamyr is the second book in a trilogy that takes place in an altered version of sixteenth-century France.
author: Michele Hauf
